title: Photostat, "Scale drawing for a teapo", December 17, 1987
inscribed: Photostat inscription(by hand) within artist stamp at lower right:GERALD GULOTTA DESIGN, INC/22 West 26th Street New York, NY 10010(stamped); FOR(stamped) TIENSHAN/YIXING(by hand); 17 DEC 87(by hand)/DATE(stamped);1:1(by hand)/scale(stamped); DRAWN BY(stamped)G[ulotta](by hand); NUMBER(stamped)/2(byhand).Photostat inscription(by hand) beneath central drawing:THIS DRAWING IS NOT COMPLETE, AND THE DESIGN MUST BE RESOLVED THREE-DIMENSIONALLY; followed by a 3 line Chinese inscription.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Scale drawing for a teapo", December 17, 1987.
December 17, 1987. photostat
Support: white paper. Gift of Gerald Gulotta. 1991-78-8.
